attributes.action: We call on HM Government to stop the BBC broadcasting biased news inciting fear
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence that BBC News was caught staging fake chemical attack in Syria, lies in reports, and that the BBC received over £2 million in EU funding before the EU referendum is shown in the RT News report below.

Note: Dr Rola on whose sole claim the BBC sent chemical weapons allegations around the world was also actually the daughter of Syrian rebel Mousa Al-Kurdi.

Evidence available in the RT News reports here:
https://youtu.be/0iC0N0rukX0
attributes.background: In August 2013 BBC News faked a chemical weapons attack and one month later altered footage with Syrian rebel help to encourage an attack on Syria. In the EU referendum, the BBC gave Corbyn no air time, are now attacking Corbyn, claiming 51.9% needed him to know how to vote. We demand objectivity

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
